title: How do I level up, and be able to discuss and comment on other topics??
body: How am I able to level up in the Boards/Forums so I am able to talk and comment in other topics such as gameplay, Esports, etc??

replies.body:
It seems your Summoner and Boards profiles hadn't synced before, but posting this caused a sync. You now show as level 30 and should have no issues posting or commenting on the boards. 

Let me know if you have any questions!
Thank You, for fixing the problem. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
